title: Notice
content:
Upgrade your project with wffweb-3.0.1 if it is released. It contains lot of major improvements for multi-threading environment.

We are verifying the stability of wffweb-3.0.1-SNAPSHOT in our production projects, we will release its production version wffweb-3.0.1 once the verification is success. It may take several days to weeks for this process to finish.
